name: Island Exploration (ds_z1)
description:
This game is called Island Exploration, starring Unity-Chan as she navigates her way through a mysterious island and avoiding obstacles to collect four magic floating keys. The UI system logs the keys as points and the player is notified that the level is completed once all four keys are found and collected.

I had two main issues when doing the project, one was having difficulty scripting the moving platforms to elevate and carry the character so I instead got creative integrated the upper level of stone platforms onto the lower level and just had it surround the island landscape.

The second issue revolved around attaching the camera to the third-person character after learning the mechanics would do better in third person than in first person. While I parented it, I noticed it causes the character to run more to the left side while running forward. The only way I was able to get around that was to hit the right-arrow key every few seconds as I’m running. This is something I may possibly fix in the future for this game on this site.

Game is a Zipped Windows Build.
